com.nexmo.sns.sdk

Class NexmoSnsClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nexmo.common.LegacyClient
      • com.nexmo.sns.sdk.NexmoSnsClient

  • public class NexmoSnsClient
extends LegacyClient
    Client for talking to the Nexmo REST interface.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NexmoSnsClient(java.lang.String apiKey, java.lang.String apiSecret)
      Constructs a NexmoSnsClient with the default base URL, a connection timeout of 5000ms and a read timeout of 30s.
      NexmoSnsClient(java.lang.String apiKey, java.lang.String apiSecret, int connectionTimeout, int soTimeout)
      Constructs a NexmoSnsClient with the default base URL.
      NexmoSnsClient(java.lang.String baseUrl, java.lang.String apiKey, java.lang.String apiSecret, int connectionTimeout, int soTimeout)
      Instantiate a new NexmoSnsClient instance that will communicate using the supplied credentials, and will use the supplied connection and read timeout values.
      Additionally, you can specify an alternative service base url.

        public NexmoSnsClient(java.lang.String apiKey,
                      java.lang.String apiSecret)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs a NexmoSnsClient with the default base URL, a connection timeout of 5000ms and a read timeout of 30s.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - Your Nexmo account api key
        apiSecret - Your Nexmo account api secret
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the XML parser could not be configured.

      • NexmoSnsClient

        public NexmoSnsClient(java.lang.String apiKey,
                      java.lang.String apiSecret,
                      int connectionTimeout,
                      int soTimeout)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        Constructs a NexmoSnsClient with the default base URL.
        Parameters:
        apiKey - Your Nexmo account api key
        apiSecret - Your Nexmo account api secret
        connectionTimeout - over-ride the default connection timeout with this value (in milliseconds)
        soTimeout - over-ride the default read-timeout with this value (in milliseconds)
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - If the XML parser could not be configured.

      • NexmoSnsClient

        public NexmoSnsClient(java.lang.String baseUrl,
                      java.lang.String apiKey,
                      java.lang.String apiSecret,
                      int connectionTimeout,
                      int soTimeout)
        Instantiate a new NexmoSnsClient instance that will communicate using the supplied credentials, and will use the supplied connection and read timeout values.
        Additionally, you can specify an alternative service base url. For example submitting to a testing sandbox environment, or if requested to submit to an alternative address by Nexmo, for example, in cases where it may be necessary to prioritize your traffic.
        Parameters:
        baseUrl - The URL to be used instead of 
        https://sns.nexmo.com/sns/xml
        apiKey - Your Nexmo account api key
        apiSecret - Your Nexmo account api secret
        connectionTimeout - over-ride the default connection timeout with this value (in milliseconds)
        soTimeout - over-ride the default read-timeout with this value (in milliseconds)
